item.title: Summing Diagonals of a Matrix in Python
item.description: I want to find the difference of sums for each diagonal of a square matrix. from sympy import * m = Matrix([ [11, 2, 4], [4, 5, 6], [10, 8, -12]]) m Matrix([ [11, 2, 4], [ 4, 5, 6], [10, 8, -12]]) We’ll write a small script that will calculate the absolute value of the difference of diagonals. $$ a = n\text{11} + \dots + n\text{nn}$$
